name: Lemuria (itch)
description:
Built for the Ludum Dare 44 jam.

The ancient continent of Lemuria lies beneath the ocean floor. You have the power raise it and shape it as you please. A sandbox continent-building game. The goal is to have the "points" (dot pattern) fill the entire screen.

Instructions: LMB to pan the camera, RMB to rotate the camera, Scroll to zoom

Note: on top of being built in less than 72 hours, this is the first game I've completed with Unity and is pretty rough around the edges. That said, I'm pretty dang proud of it. I think Lemuria has some interesting visual concepts and novel gameplay, and I hope you'll enjoy it. ✌️
